title: Document Analysis Report
summary: This document is an IT Services Agreement between SOA Group Inc. and Vorba Corp. outlining the terms for IT consulting services provided to the Ontario Treasury Board Secretariat.
keyFindings: The agreement specifies the scope of services, payment terms, and conditions for termination.
VORBA is required to adhere to confidentiality and non-competition clauses.
The agreement includes provisions for quality of services and liability limitations.

sections.title: Services and Payment
sections.content: VORBA will provide IT consulting services at a rate of CAD $90 per hour, with specific conditions for overtime and payment schedules.
keyPoints: Services are to be documented by the Client's requisition.
Payments are due on the 23rd of the following month after timesheet approval.

sections.title: Termination and Overpayment
sections.content: The agreement can be terminated with two weeks' notice or immediately under certain conditions. Overpayments must be repaid upon demand.
keyPoints: Termination can occur with notice or due to unavoidable causes.
Any overpayment exceeding $176,175 is to be repaid immediately.

sections.title: Confidentiality and Non-Competition
sections.content: VORBA agrees to confidentiality and will not accept work from the Client without SOA's consent for 12 months post-agreement.
keyPoints: VORBA must return all Client information upon completion or termination.
Non-competition clause restricts VORBA from soliciting the Client directly.

recommendations: Ensure all parties are aware of the payment and termination terms to avoid disputes.
Regularly review compliance with confidentiality and non-competition clauses.
